title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 December 2011 - XWiki
content:
00:02 <rrodriguez> has quit  
00:10 <fmancinelli> has quit  
00:17 <abusenius> has quit  
14:56 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:00 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:19 <vmassol> has quit  
15:22 <+tmortagne> vmassol: I would not not displaying the description, it's ok for a first version I thing until we decide what's the best strategy during 3.4  
15:43 <+mflorea> vmassol: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/DocumentSheetBinding missing. Don't we import the latest XAR when upgrading xwiki.org?  
15:45 <+tmortagne> mflorea: not this time  
15:45 <+tmortagne> we were waiting for the final version for the xar  
15:46 <+tmortagne> didn't expecting broken API  
15:47 <+mflorea> ok, then the issues with the title displayed in the browser tab bar should be fixed after the 3.3 xar is imported. The proper title is displayed for me on the latest 3.3 snapshot  
15:47 <+tmortagne> or do you mean there is just some feature missing and nothing broken ?  
15:47 <+mflorea> vmassol: complained that the title displayed in the browse tab bar for http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences is wrong  
15:48 <+mflorea> it's not that important, but it should be fixed after the 3.3 xar import  
15:48 <+tmortagne> I can see there is an explicit title in that document, shouldn't it be the one taken ?  
15:49 <+tmortagne> "XWiki Preferences"  
15:49 <+mflorea> no, the sheet decides the displayed title  
15:49 <+mflorea> in this case the AdminSheet  
15:50 <+tmortagne> ok  
16:07 <+sburjan> hello. can someone tell me the issue ID of the memory leak we fixed last week ?  
16:07 <+sburjan> is it XRENDERING-161 ?  
16:11 <npm> has quit  
16:13 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* r3aa1502 / (8 files in 5 dirs): XWIKI-7241: Uninstall job does not produce an error when trying to ...  
16:13 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* rd86a31a / (7 files in 4 dirs): XWIKI-7244: ConcurrentModificationException when uninstalling from all ...  
16:14 <CIA-115> tmortagne feature-extension-versions \* r62bc2f7 / (8 files in 5 dirs): XWIKI-7241: Uninstall job does not produce an error when trying to ...  
16:14 <CIA-115> tmortagne feature-extension-versions \* rbc73a9e / (7 files in 4 dirs): XWIKI-7244: ConcurrentModificationException when uninstalling from all ...  
16:14 <CIA-115> tmortagne feature-extension-versions \* rbb070be / (2 files): XWIKI-7240: Add special support for "milestone" and "rc" in EM version manager - http://git.io/y9k4sQ  
16:15 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
16:16 <+tmortagne> there was XRENDERING-161 but that's not really a leak just something that takes a lot of memory that was not cached (by "chance") in 3.1.1  
16:17 <+tmortagne> I thin vmassol detailed a bit in the mail he sent  
16:17 <+tmortagne> think  
16:18 <+tmortagne> indeed he did not mentioned the jira ids  
17:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:34 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
17:46 <CIA-115> Denis Gervalle master \* r3f6517d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-handlers/xwiki-platform-extension-handler-jar/src/test/java/org/xwiki/extension/jar/JarExtensionHandlerTest.java : XWIKI-7201: Properly unload jar extension on uninstallation without restarting ...  
18:01 <+sburjan> vmassol: I had a 2 hour call with Ludovic about the Oracle issue. It seems that we have some wrong mappings in oracle xml file. We managed to create a working mappings file (still needs to be manually tested in the XE), and I will create a issue about it. ATM we don't support Oracle at least in 3.3  
18:02 <vmassol> sburjan: ok  
18:03 <+sburjan> I will post the bundled mappings file from the jar, the one that works, and a diff file. looks pretty nasty there, a lot of types and length limitations and casting issues. We were not able to determine if this was caused by Oracle (11g) or some hibernate issue  
18:03 <+sburjan> I will ping you when I have created the issue (tomorrow)  
18:18 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:18 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
18:24 <CIA-115> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rf1ee6a6 / (4 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7237: mailto is not stripped when editing a link to an e-mail address - http://git.io/ThpwIw  
18:26 <CIA-115> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r079bb9b / xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/src/test/it/org/xwiki/test/wysiwyg/LinkTest.java : XWIKI-7237: mailto is not stripped when editing a link to an e-mail address ...  
18:47 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* rc0e1055 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/repository/LocalExtensionRepository.java : Improve javadoc - http://git.io/2lcoew  
18:47 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* r685add3 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7245: Wiki syntax is interpreted in summary - http://git.io/iBpsww  
18:49 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* re298c9a / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7245: Wiki syntax is interpreted in summary - http://git.io/dKKgxw  
18:52 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:55 <CIA-115> Denis Gervalle master \* r2dfe49d / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/handler/internal/DefaultExtensionInitializer.java : XWIKI-7195: Generalize the initialization of extension at application startup for all type of extension ...  
19:02 <Enygma`> has quit  
19:04 <sburjan> has quit  
19:07 <jvdrean> has quit  
19:19 <CIA-115> tmortagne master \* r1ca32e5 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-extension/xwiki-platform-extension-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/extension/handler/ExtensionInitializer.java : Improve javadoc - http://git.io/WTHh8A  
19:27 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:47 <CIA-115> cjdelisle feature-store-attachments-newstore \* re2d067f / (24 files in 13 dirs): Got code to compile, ...  
19:55 <lucaa> has quit  
20:01 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Pong  
20:02 <vmassol> sdumitriu: just wanted to ping you about the description field in the EM UI. After discussing with Thomas we think it's best to not display it for 3.3RC1 since it's currently not working. Instead we can jsut display the <url>  
20:05 <vmassol> you're still there?  
20:05 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
20:05 <@sdumitriu> OK  
20:06 <vmassol> it's probabl the simplest to be able to release now  
20:06 <vmassol> I think everyone is ready for the release even though for sure we haven't had enough time to stabilize stuff :(  
20:06 <vmassol> we still have a few days before the final though  
20:07 <@sdumitriu> OK, then I'll start in a few minutes  
20:07 <vmassol> can you fix the descirption before you release?  
20:07 <@sdumitriu> sburjan`: I saw something about Oracle in the earlier logs  
20:07 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Yes  
20:07 <vmassol> so that we have something that's supposed to be all good  
20:07 <vmassol> ok cool  
20:07 <vmassol> ah there's still the issue raised by Denis  
20:08 <vmassol> but that seems a bit late to postpone the RC1 release IMO  
20:08 <vmassol> (since we're already very late)  
20:09 <vmassol> maybe could be fixed just after RC1  
20:09 <vmassol> (in case there's something to do)  
20:09 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: I see someone already committed the removal of description  
20:09 <vmassol> ah  
20:10 <vmassol> maybe thomas did it  
20:10 <@sdumitriu> XWIKI-7245  
20:10 <vmassol> summary  
20:10 <vmassol> that's different from description I think  
20:10 <vmassol> no?  
20:10 <vmassol> (haven't checked the code)  
20:10 <@sdumitriu> Yes, but he also commented out the description  
20:11 <vmassol> ok  
20:11 <vmassol> then we're good then  
20:11 <@sdumitriu> Starting the release process  
20:11 <vmassol> please fix the func tests just after please  
20:11 <vmassol> the extension ui ones  
20:11 <vmassol> so that we have them for the final  
20:12 <vmassol> hmm some wysiwyg tests are failing: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/  
20:12 <vmassol> mflorea: ?  
20:12 <@sdumitriu> wysiwyg is flickering, as far as I've seen  
20:13 <vmassol> I think this is different  
20:13 <vmassol> look here: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/  
20:13 <vmassol> and some of the failing tests are new from today  
20:13 <vmassol> (some if not all)  
20:14 <vmassol> I saw a commit from marius at around the time they started failing  
20:15 <vmassol> XWIKI-7237  
20:15 <vmassol> as can be shown here: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/639/  
20:15 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/639/changes#detail0  
20:16 <@sdumitriu> Right, these are new  
20:16 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Any idea?  
21:16 <+mflorea> checking now, sorry for delay  
21:26 <+mflorea> indeed, my fault, fixing now  
21:38 <CIA-115> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* rad69990 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-client/src/main/java/org/xwiki/gwt/wysiwyg/client/plugin/link/ui/EmailAddressLinkWizardStep.java : XWIKI-7237: mailto is not stripped when editing a link to an e-mail address ...  
21:38 <CIA-115> Marius Dumitru Florea master \* r7df1a03 / (5 files in 5 dirs): Merge branch 'master' of github.com:xwiki/xwiki-platform - http://git.io/\_3-jhQ  
21:38 <vmassol> thanks mflorea for fixing so late! :)  
21:39 <+mflorea> np, sorry for delaying the release  
21:40 <@sdumitriu> I'm reviewing translations  
21:41 <@sdumitriu> Seems that people don't know what to do with {0,choice} messages  
21:42 <+mflorea> I would need to read some doc about it myself :)  
22:17 <vmassol> stopping bot for debugging  
22:30 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
22:30 <vmassol> cool works :)  
22:30 <vmassol> thanks  
22:33 <vmassol> so the bot should restart by itself from now on  
22:33 <+jvelociter> cool  
22:36 <vmassol> XE-1037  
22:36 <vmassol> (ok works,)  
22:37 <vmassol> got to go, nn  
22:37 <vmassol> has quit  
22:43 <CIA-115> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* ra7e73be / (4 files in 2 dirs): [release] Updated translations - http://git.io/sOlAcQ  
22:54 <DrLou> has quit  
22:55 <mflorea> has quit  
22:56 <abusenius> has quit  
22:56 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
22:58 <CIA-115> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* ra037370 / (15 files in 4 dirs): [release] Updated translations - http://git.io/bW2ueA  
22:59 <DrLou> has quit  
22:59 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
23:02 <DrLou> has quit  
23:02 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
23:07 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
23:34 <evalica> has quit
